name: Sketch Battles (Early Access)
description:
Sketchy Situations needs Sketchy Solutions!

Sometimes when you are bored in your school or job you will sketch some things, do you remember those sketches? You should prepare yourself because those sketches are coming for you!

In Sketch Battles, you will face sketch arts has the objective of destroying you. And for each level, you should erase that level's boss.

(In Early Access)
